DataElement.preferredName: Patient Request Intervention or Procedure Therapy Reason Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free-text field to reason related to a patient requesting to receive escalated or more aggressive treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Request Intervention or Procedure Therapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a patient requesting to receive escalated or more aggressive treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:Express the need or desire for; ask for.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Express the need or desire for; ask for.

Property.preferredDefinition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population.  This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmnetal acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: DPBRN CRF:Dental Practice-Based Research Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free-text field to explain why a therapy was administered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

DataElement.origin: DPBRN CRF:Dental Practice-Based Research Network Case Report Form
